entities.name: beauxbatons
entities.description: Beauxbatons is mentioned as one of the schools that Harry and Ron had paid for S.P.E.W. badges.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: Durmstrang is mentioned as one of the schools that Harry and Ron had paid for S.P.E.W. badges.

relationships.description: Hermione is mentioned as badgering Harry and Ron about the S.P.E.W. badge, which they had bought for Beauxbatons.
Hermione is mentioned as badgering Harry and Ron about the S.P.E.W. badge, which they had bought for Durmstrang.
Hermione is badgering Harry to wear the S.P.E.W. badge and persuade others to do the same.
Hermione is badgering Ron to wear the S.P.E.W. badge and persuade others to do the same.
Neville paid up for the S.P.E.W. badge just to stop Hermione from glowering at him.
